message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I get $60, you get $40.  It's important to settle this quickly because the value decreases rapidly for you with each round.
Alice, your offer was too low. Let's be reasonable - I take $55, you get $45.  The clock is ticking, every round costs us!
Bob, this is the best offer you'll get. Your share is rapidly shrinking, take the $45 before it's even less!
